Record.Value: Hydroponics + Food
Hydroponics + Food
Getting hungry? Test your ability to feed yourself offworld.
Practical Training: Stage VI.
Welcome Cadet. It's time to test your ability to provide sustenance for yourself far, far from home.
In this phase of testing, we'll look at your ability to grow food, then cook it up into something useful. The first step is to create a water network. Start by building a liquid tank connector.
Build tank connector in the highlighted position
Wrestle water tank onto tank connector
Use wrench to connect water tank to tank connector.
Tank connectors let you attach tanks to pipe networks. Finish the liquid pipe network by connecting the liquid pipes to the hydroponic tray array.
Get liquid pipes from crate
Place pipe
Place the last pipe and Finish pipe system
Before you plant anything, set up a grow light so you can grow all through the night, too, bruh.
Get grow light kit from crate
Place grow light in highlighted position
Turn on growlight

Different plants require different atmospheric ratios. But today, we're just testing the basics: you've got water, light, and the correct gas mix, so it's time to plant wheat in each of the hydroponic trays.
Get wheat from crate
Plant wheat in the hydroponics trays.
We'll be testing your skills with gas systems in the next phase, but for now, just wait for the wheat to grow. We've added a little super fertilizer to speed things up.
Wait for wheat to grow.
It's harvest time! You can eat raw wheat - if you like - but it will provide more nourishment if you cook it. Harvest 20 wheat, then use the reagent processor to turn it into flour.
Harvest 20 wheat
Add wheat to reagent processor funnel
Turn on bench
Turn on reagent processor

In a moment, you'll have flour, so you can get baking. You can cook a variety of foods in the microwave, including muffins. Sound delicious? Make sure to follow the recipe exactly, because baking is a science.
Add egg to microwave
Add 10ml milk to microwave
Add 50g flour to microwave
Turn on the microwave
Bake muffin
You're about to recieve one of Agrizero's finest muffins. Enjoy it, and banish that hunger, Cadet.
Eat the muffin

Well done, Cadet. You've demonstrated a high degree of self-sufficiency, and acceptable culinary talents. Stationeer Command will be proud of you. Press the important blue button to transmit your results.
Press important button
Create flour
Hydroponic trays are a simple, effective way to grow plants of all sorts. Finish the system by adding another tray to the array.
Close the microwave
Open the microwave
Build hydroponics tray
Build cable in the highlighted position
Pick up cable
Pick up cable
Pick up hydroponic tray
Get Flour from the reagent processor
Good work, Cadet, you have demonstrated acceptable hydroponic skills
Wait for wheat to grow
Get the water filter kit from the crate
Place the water botlle filler in the highlighted location on the wall
Drinking water is grate but what happens when you run out of water, luckily you can use the water bottle filler to do this.
Get the empty water bottle from the crate
Add the empty water bottle to the water bottle filler
To get the water out of the ice you will need to crush and melt it down. Luckily this is all automated with the use of the Ice Crusher.
Get mining belt from the crate
Take the ice out of the mining belt and put it in the Ice crusher
Turn on the Ice crusher
